title: Mass shootings in the U.S. : legality of shooter 's weapons , as of February 2020
summary: Since the end of 2019 , there were 283 patients in england waiting for a lung transplant , while scotland had 28 individuals on the lung transplant waiting list , followed by 22 and 14 waiting in wales and northern ireland respectively . lung transplants carried out in the uk In the year to 2019 , 164 lung transplants were carried out in the united kingdom as a whole . This represented a 20 percent increase on the number of transplants from the previous year .

data.Category Of The Weapon: Some weapons were legally obtained others possibly illegally

gold: 82 of the mass shootings in the United States between 1982 and February 2020 involved weapons which were obtained legally ; a clear majority . Only 16 incidents involved guns that were obtained illegally . Legally owned firearms in the U.S .
